backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining types (Lesson, PracticeProblem, Progress, PracticeSession) and storage maps for lessons, problems, and user progress with initialization and CRUD functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features for mainnet deployment verification: frontend-backend connectivity, Internet Identity authentication, and static asset accessibility.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files with focus on mainnet deployment readiness and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with neon green primary colors and brainrot-themed design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with production-ready meta tags, theme color, SEO description, and optimized Google Fonts preconnect for Inter font family.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes including home, lessons, practice areas, practice mode with topic selection, sessions, and summaries.
frontend/src/components/AchievementBadge: Achievement badge component displaying achievement text with conditional badge images and graceful error handling for missing assets.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component wrapping all pages with Navigation header and footer containing Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LessonCard.tsx: Clickable lesson card component displaying lesson title, difficulty stars, clean content preview, and hover effects with BookOpen icon.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation component with sticky header, logo, nav links (Home, Lessons, Practice, Practice Mode, Progress), and Internet Identity authentication dropdown menu.
Displays a single practice problem with input field, submit/reset buttons, and feedback UI showing correct/incorrect results with themed messages.
frontend/src/components/PracticeSessionH: Sticky header for practice sessions displaying topic name, progress counter (problems completed/total), and elapsed time timer.
frontend/src/components/ProgressDashboar: Dashboard displaying user progress stats (lessons completed, streak, average score), motivational messages, achievements badges, and practice score history.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state changes and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteLesson.ts: Mutation hook for marking a lesson as complete, invalidating progress queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useLessons.ts: Query hook that fetches all lessons from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeProblems.t: Query hook that fetches all practice problems from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeProblemsBy: Query hook that fetches practice problems filtered by a specific topic string.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeSessionTim: Timer hook that tracks elapsed seconds and returns formatted time string (MM:SS) for practice sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Query hook that fetches user progress data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitPracticeScor: Mutation hook for submitting a practice problem score (problemId and score), invalidating progress queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitPracticeSess: Mutation hook for recording a complete practice session, invalidating progress queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a neon green color scheme for light and dark modes, including primary, secondary, accent, and chart colors. Sets Inter font family for body and headings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, authentication-aware CTAs (login or browse lessons), and features section promoting the math learning platform with brainrot-themed messaging.
frontend/src/pages/LessonBrowser.tsx: Displays a grid of available lessons fetched from the backend canister, with loading states, error handling with retry functionality, and navigation to individual lesson details.
frontend/src/pages/LessonDetail.tsx: Shows detailed lesson content with markdown-style formatting (headings, bold text, lists), extracts and displays pro tips, and provides a completion button to mark lessons as done.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeArea.tsx: Practice problem interface with pagination controls to navigate through problems, displays loading and error states with retry functionality, and shows progress indicator.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeModePage.tsx: Topic selection page displaying a grid of math topics (fractions, decimals, algebra, etc.) with icons and themed colors, allowing users to navigate to topic-specific practice sessions.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeSessionPage.t: Main practice session page that displays problems for a given topic, tracks user answers, manages navigation between problems, and handles session completion with timer tracking and submission to backend.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeSessionSummar: Displays practice session results including accuracy, time taken, and problems attempted with motivational messages and options to retry or return to topic selection.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressTracking.tsx: Progress tracking page that requires Internet Identity authentication and displays user progress dashboard with loading, error, and unauthenticated states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius values, animations, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing a math learning app for middle schoolers with brainrot themes, containing architectural notes, known issues, and existing features list.
